name: TrippleTrouble
description:
== Tripple Trouble ==

Platformer game with shapeshifring character. Young adventurer insulted some mages and was cursed three times in a row! Now he should apologize to remove the curses, and from now on - better never make fun of wizards! ;) 

CONTROLS:

w,a,s,d  or arrows- movement

Spacebar or RMB - jump

LMB or LeftCtrl- Attack (Human & wolf form only)

Entry for LudumDare 49 by LAVAteam.
